name: automation-exercise-tests

scripts.allure:history: if exist allure-report/history move allure-report/history allure-results/history
scripts.allure:clear: if exist allure-results rmdir /s /q allure-results && if exist allure-report rmdir /s /q allure-report
scripts.allure:test: npm run allure:clear && npm run allure:generate && npm run test && npm run allure:history && npm run allure:open

author: Julio Santos
description: Projeto de testes automatizados em site e API usando Cypress, Cucumber e JavaScript.
